configure_and_validate.title: Configure Environment
configure_and_validate.description_short: Configure you Environment including creating the `fabric_rc` and `ssh_config` files.

list_all_resources.title: Listing Available Resources
list_all_resources.description_short: List resource capacity and availability. Output options: Text, Pandas, JSON, and Python List[Dict]. Find sites containing available components and capacities.

create_slice.title: Validate and Submit a Slice
create_slice.description_short: Options that can be used when creating, validating, and submitting current or future slices.

delete_slice.title: Delete Slice(s)
delete_slice.description_short: Options for deleting a slice or slices.

list_slices.title: List All Slice(s), Slice's Nodes, Networks, Components, and Interfaces
list_slices.description_long: Find and list parts of slice(s).

renew_slice.title: Extending a Slice Reservation
renew_slice.description_short: Extend a slice reservation for a longer period of time.

save_and_load.title: Save/Load Slices
save_and_load.description_short: Save an experimental topology and load it at a later time.

ssh_keys.title: Add/Remove SSH Keys
ssh_keys.description_short: Add/Remove SSH Keys to VMs in your slice.

slice_sharing.title: Share Slices
slice_sharing.description_short: Collaborative Slice Access between project members.

modify_slice.title: Modifying Slices
modify_slice.description_short: Modify an existing slice by adding/removing resources.

customizing_nodes.title: Customizing Nodes
customizing_nodes.description_short: Set node properties (site, image, cores, ram, disk, etc.).

ssh_to_nodes.title: Execute Commands on Nodes
ssh_to_nodes.description_short: Show how to remotely log into a running FABRIC node.

ssh_tunnels.title: SSH Tunnels
ssh_tunnels.description_short: Create SSH tunnels from your local machine (i.e., your laptop) to FABRIC Nodes.

local_disk.title: Local Disk
local_disk.description_short: Create a node with a custom local disk size.

basic_nvme_devices.title: NVMe Devices
basic_nvme_devices.description_short: Create a node with an NVMe device.

persistent_storage.title: Persistent Storage
persistent_storage.description_short: Connect to your project's persistent storage volume.

fabric_all_gpus.title: All FABRIC GPUs: Tesla T4, RTX6000, A30, A40
fabric_all_gpus.description_short: Create a node with any GPU type.

create_l3network_fabnet_ipv4.title: FABNet IPv4 (Layer 3)
create_l3network_fabnet_ipv4.description_long: Connect to FABRIC's IPv4 internet with three configuration options - auto, manual or user defined.

create_l3network_fabnet_ipv4_ext.title: FABNet IPv4 Ext (Layer 3)
create_l3network_fabnet_ipv4_ext.description_short: Connect to FABRIC's IPv4 internet with external access

create_l3network_fabnet_ipv6.title: FABNet IPv6 (Layer 3)
create_l3network_fabnet_ipv6.description_long: Connect to FABRIC's IPv6 internet with three configuration options - auto, manual or user defined

create_l3network_fabnet_ipv6_ext.title: FABNet IPv6 Ext (Layer 3)
create_l3network_fabnet_ipv6_ext.description_short: Connect to FABRIC's IPv6 internet with external access

create_l2network_basic.title: Local Ethernet (Layer 2)
create_l2network_basic.description_short: Create a private local Ethernet network on a FABRIC site
create_l2network_basic.description_long: Create a private local Ethernet network on a FABRIC site with three configuration options - auto, manual or user defined

create_l2network_wide_area.title: Wide Area Link (Layer 2)
create_l2network_wide_area.description_short: Create a private WAN Ethernet link between FABRIC sites
create_l2network_wide_area.description_long: Create a private WAN Ethernet link between FABRIC sites with three configuration options - auto, manual or user defined

create_port_mirror.title: Port Mirroring
create_port_mirror.description_short: Listen in on traffic in FABRIC dataplane using PortMirror service
create_port_mirror.description_long: Listen in on traffic in FABRIC dataplane using PortMirror service - Infrastructure Port Mirroring or InSlice Port Mirroring

sub_interfaces.title: Sub Interfaces
sub_interfaces.description_short: Create VLAN-tagged sub-interfaces for Smart NICs, enabling multiple Network Services connections.

fabric_fpgas.title: Provision a single FPGA and/or configure it using ESnet workflow
fabric_fpgas.description_short: Provision a single FPGA and/or configure it using ESnet workflow.

upload_and_execute.title: Upload and Execute Scripts
upload_and_execute.description_short: Upload a script and execute it.

parallel_config.title: Parallel Experiment Configuration
parallel_config.description_short: Use threads to configure experiments in parallel.

post_boot_tasks.title: Post Boot Tasks
post_boot_tasks.description_short: Define post boot tasks with or without templates to upload files and execute commands.

add_keys_into_slice.title: Adding other user's keys into slice
add_keys_into_slice.description_short: Add new keys on submit or add later via POA (Perform Operational Action).

FRRouting.title: FRRouting OSPF
FRRouting.description_short: Example of deploying OSPF across a wide-area using FRRouting (similar to Quagga).

openvswitch.title: OpenVSwitch
openvswitch.description_short: Example of deploying OpenVSwitch in a node.

iperf3.title: iPerf3
iperf3.description_short: Test bandwidth across your FABRIC slice.
iperf3.description_long: Test bandwidth across your FABRIC slice. Apply CPU Pinning and Numa tuning with NIC_Basic or Smart NICs and test bandwidth across your FABRIC slice.

dpdk_smart_nic.title: DPDK and Pktgen with Smart NICs
dpdk_smart_nic.description_short: Program your smart nics with DPDK.

peering_client.title: Peering Client
peering_client.description_short: Setting up a PEERING client on FABRIC

grafana_prometheus_servers.title: Measuring and Visualizing with Grafana and Prometheus
grafana_prometheus_servers.description_short: Deploy a Grafana/Prometheus services on a FABIRC node using Docker. Create a slice that can be monitored by a Grafana/Prometheus server.

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes Cluster
kubernetes.description_short: Create a private Kubernetes cluster on FABRIC resources.

tailscale.title: Tailscale Mesh VPN
tailscale.description_short: Create a private mesh VPN with [Tailscale](http://tailscale.com) to accesss and manage your slice.

p4_labs_bmv2.title: P4 Labs (BMv2)
p4_labs_bmv2.description_short: Lab series on P4 programmable switches using the Behavioral Model (BMv2).

public_demos.title: Demos and Tutorials
public_demos.description_short: Files for live demos and tutorials.

Chameleon_Facility_Port.title: Chameleon Facility Ports
Chameleon_Facility_Port.description_short: Create slices spanning Chameleon and FABRIC via Layer 2 or Layer 3

Cloudlab_Facility_Port.title: CloudLab Facility Ports
Cloudlab_Facility_Port.description_short: Create slices spanning Cloud Labe and FABRIC via Layer 2

mflib.title: Monitoring with MFLib Examples
mflib.description_short: Examples for setting up automated monitoring in your slice.
